description: Registers a CA certificate with Amazon Web Services IoT Core. There is no limit to the number of CA certificates you can register in your Amazon Web Services account. You can register up to 10 CA certificates with the same CA subject field per Amazon Web Services account. Requires permission to access the RegisterCACertificate action.

parameters.name: setAsActive
parameters.description: A boolean value that specifies if the CA certificate is set to active. Valid values: ACTIVE | INACTIVE.

parameters.name: registrationConfig
parameters.description: Information about the registration configuration. templateBody (string) --- The template body. roleArn (string) --- The ARN of the role. templateName (string) --- The name of the provisioning template.

nested_params.name: templateName
nested_params.description: The name of the provisioning template.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Metadata which can be used to manage the CA certificate. (dict) --- A set of key/value pairs that are used to manage the resource. The tag's key. Value (string) --- The tag's value.
